item.description:
Loretta LaRoche will be appearing at the Palace Theatre doing her show entitled "Lighten Up" For those of you who don't know Loretta, she is a comedian who is highly sought after for her workshops on stress management. She uses humor to help us see how we take ourselves too seriously and how we can laugh and enjoy life more.
"One night I greeted Bob at the door wearing nothing but his winged tip shoes. I was laughing hysterically at how I looked. Bob did not crack a smile. Instead he bellowed, "What are the neighbors going to think?" "I don't know," I replied, "I haven't shown them yet."

Join us for a fun filled night of Loretta. You can purchase tickets online at www.palacetheatre.org or call the theatre at 603-668-5588. Tickets are $38.00 and $58.00. The $58.00 tickets include a pre show VIP meet and greet with Loretta. We are planning to have dinner before the show and meet at Tiya's Thai 8 Hanover St. Manchester at 6:00. There is on street parking with meters and a parking garage across from the theatre.
item.how_to_find_us: We can meet at the restaurant .

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Lighten Up with Loretta LaRoche
